amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of State to report to Congress every three months listing all complaints by the government of Cuba to departments and agencies of the U.S. government concerning actions taken by U.S. citizens or the U.S. government.
amendment.purpose: An amendment requiring the Secretary of State to report to Congress every three months listing all complaints by the Goverment of Cuba to departments and agencies of the U.S. concerning actions taken by U.S. citizens or the the U.S. government.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Serrano amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Mr. Serrano demanded a separate vote on the Serrano amendment (A021).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Serrano amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 141 - 287 (Roll no. 191).
